title: Is This A.I. Thanksgiving Menu Better Than a Humanâ€™s?
description: Researchers are using artificial intelligence to create recipes, complete with appetizing photos and back stories. But Thanksgiving poses a challenge.
dc:creator: Priya Krishna and Cade Metz
media:credit: Timothy O'Connell for The New York Times
media:description: Can artificial intelligence create a better Thanksgiving menu than people can? A reporter, Priya Krishna, put that to the test.
